failure-device.help: Serial number of the node to include.
failure-device.name: failure-device

options.help: No failure.
options.name: none

options.help: An internal error occurred.
options.name: internal

options.help: The upgrade timed out.
options.name: timeout

options.help: The device type was not supported by the FortiGate.
options.name: device-type-unsupported

options.help: The image could not be downloaded.
options.name: download-failed

options.help: The device was disconnected from the FortiGate.
options.name: device-missing

options.help: An image matching the device and version could not be found.
options.name: version-unavailable

options.help: The image could not be pushed to the device.
options.name: staging-failed

options.help: The device could not be rebooted.
options.name: reboot-failed

options.help: The device did not reconnect after rebooting.
options.name: device-not-reconnected

options.help: A device in the CSF tree was not ready.
options.name: node-not-ready

options.help: The coordinating FortiGate did not confirm the upgrade.
options.name: no-final-confirmation

options.help: A downstream FortiGate did not initiate final confirmation.
options.name: no-confirmation-query

coordinating-fortigate.help: The serial of the FortiGate that controls this device
coordinating-fortigate.name: coordinating-fortigate

device-type.help: What type of device this node represents.
device-type.name: device-type

options.help: This device is a FortiGate.
options.name: fortigate

options.help: This device is a FortiSwitch.
options.name: fortiswitch

options.help: This device is a FortiAP.
options.name: fortiap

serial.help: Serial number of the node to include.
serial.name: serial

setup-time.help: When the upgrade was configured. Format hh:mm yyyy/mm/dd UTC.
setup-time.name: setup-time

time.help: Scheduled time for the upgrade. Format hh:mm yyyy/mm/dd UTC.
time.name: time

timing.help: Whether the upgrade should be run immediately, or at a scheduled time.
timing.name: timing

options.help: Begin the upgrade immediately.
options.name: immediate

options.help: Begin the upgrade at a configured time.
options.name: scheduled

node-list.help: Nodes which will be included in the upgrade.
node-list.name: node-list

options.help: No federated upgrade has been configured.
options.name: disabled

options.help: The upgrade has been configured.
options.name: initialized

options.help: The image is downloading in preparation for the upgrade.
options.name: downloading

options.help: The image downloads are complete, but one or more devices have disconnected.
options.name: device-disconnected

options.help: The image download finished and the upgrade is pending.
options.name: ready

options.help: The upgrade is confirmed and images are being staged.
options.name: staging

options.help: The upgrade is ready and final checks are in progress.
options.name: final-check

options.help: The upgrade is ready and devices are being rebooted.
options.name: upgrade-devices

options.help: The upgrade was cancelled due to the tree not being ready.
options.name: cancelled

options.help: The upgrade was confirmed and reboots are running.
options.name: confirmed

options.help: The upgrade completed successfully.
options.name: done

options.help: The upgrade failed due to a local issue.
options.name: failed

results.help: Coordinate federated upgrades within the Security Fabric.
results.name: federated-upgrade
